ModMetaData.name: [ATW] Ridiculous Warg Variety
ModMetaData.author: MG_Atwood
ModMetaData.description:
Replaces the vanilla warg texture and adds a ridiculous number of hyena- and dog-based colours and patterns without making each one a separate breed.
Safe to add or remove at any time.
Load after Animal Variety Coats, Vanilla Textures Expanded or any other mods that alter the graphics of the vanilla warg(this will override the VTE warg textures).
